text: Wilmot Reed Hastings Jr. (born October 8, 1960) is an American businessman. He was born in Boston, Massachusetts. Hastings is the co-founder, chairman, and co-chief executive officer (CEO) of Netflix. He is on the boards and non- profit organizations. mango ==References== Category:1960 births Category:Living people Category:Educators from Boston Category:American political activists Category:Businesspeople from Boston
title: Reed Hastings
